clusterList.phrase: there will be no nuclear war and no one on earth can start a war in space
rather than a breakthrough the g8's announcement on 2050 is another stalling tactic that does nothing to lower the risk faced by millions of poor people right now
there will be a realization that the world isn't coming to an end
we don't see the world getting less connected in the future

yes it might and there might be a nuclear war next year there might be a huge asteroid impact there might be a global disease pandemic merely pointing out that a catastrophic event or outcome is possible doesn't tell us anything useful about how to respond to that possibility
we may have less than 10 years in order to make dramatic changes lest we lose the chance to avoid catastrophic results from the climate crisis
we won't have anything that we can bring into place in 2030 say when suddenly the world is at a crisis point
